Header.title: Print Your Medical Books with
Header.description: Get your medical textbooks and study materials printed with professional quality. Our platform provides seamless printing services for medical students to enhance their learning experience.

features.title: Print Your Medical Books
features.description: Easily print your medical textbooks and study materials with our new features designed for your convenience. Now you can manage printing orders effortlessly.

feature1.title: High Quality Printing
feature1.description: Print your medical books with high quality and excellent clarity, whether large textbooks or small study materials.

feature2.title: Fast Delivery
feature2.description: Get your printed books delivered to your home quickly with ZR Express fast delivery service.

feature3.title: Flexible Options
feature3.description: Choose between different types of paper, sizes, and covers based on your study needs and preferences.

feature4.title: Order Tracking
feature4.description: Track your order status from printing to delivery anytime, anywhere.

footer.description: Welcome to our innovative book printing platform offering convenient and accessible printing solutions for medical students. Our platform enables users to seamlessly print medical textbooks and study materials, whether it's for large volumes, custom formats, or quick delivery to your home.
footer.description2: With our user-friendly interface and comprehensive printing services, we strive to provide quality educational materials that fit your study needs. Experience the future of academic printing with us.

subscribtion.title: Subscribe for updates
subscribtion.description: Be the first to be notified at the app release.

modal.title: We are
modal.subtitle: Stay Updated
modal.description: Subscribe to get our news and give us your suggestions

ourapps.title: Download our
ourapps.description: Get our mobile app for easy book printing on the go. Upload, customize, and order your medical books with just a few taps.

service.title: Professional Book Printing
service.description: Our printing platform is designed to help medical students get their textbooks and study materials printed with professional quality and fast delivery.

service1.title: Textbook Printing
service1.description: High-quality printing of medical textbooks with clear text and diagrams, perfect for studying and reference.

service2.title: Study Materials
service2.description: Print your lecture notes, summaries, and study guides with professional binding and formatting.

service3.title: Express Delivery
service3.description: Get your printed books delivered quickly to your home with ZR Express fast delivery service.

steps.title: How it works ?
steps.step1: Open the mobile app and browse available medical books.
steps.step2: Search and filter books by subject, author, or course to find exactly what you need.
steps.step3: Select your desired book and choose printing options (paper type, size, binding).
steps.step4: Start the printing process and confirm your order details.
steps.step5: Receive a call from our team to confirm delivery address and payment method.
steps.step6: Get your printed books delivered to your home and complete payment.
